articles.title: Getting Started
articles.description: Your first Shiny app, how to get started.
articles.contents:
Contents
Templates

Getting an app started begins with just a .R file. There are some choices to make in the beginningâ€“a single file app or a multi-page one. Aside from personal preference, it will depend on how you like to organize your code and how large your code base might be. For this first part of the session, we will learn with a single file app.
Templates
File > Shiny Web App
The Application Name is
